name: IKFilterBrowserPanel
desc: The IKFilterBrowserPanel class provides a user interface that allows users to browse Core Image filters (CIFilter), to preview a filter, and to get additional information about the filter, such as its description.

items.name: func filterName() -> String!
items.desc: Returns the name of the filter that is currently selected in the filter browser.

items.name: func filterBrowserView(options: [AnyHashable : Any]!) -> IKFilterBrowserView!
items.desc: Returns a view that contains a filter browser.

items.name: func begin(options: [AnyHashable : Any]!, modelessDelegate: Any!, didEnd: Selector!, contextInfo: UnsafeMutableRawPointer!)
items.desc: Displays the filter browser in a new utility window, unless the filter browser is already open.

items.name: func beginSheet(options: [AnyHashable : Any]!, modalFor: NSWindow!, modalDelegate: Any!, didEnd: Selector!, contextInfo: UnsafeMutableRawPointer!)
items.desc: Displays the filter browser in a sheetâ€”that is, a dialog that is attached to its parent window and must be dismissed by the user.

items.name: func runModal(options: [AnyHashable : Any]!) -> Int32
items.desc: Displays the filter browser in a modal dialog that must be dismissed by the user but that is not attached to a window.

items.name: class func filterBrowserPanel(withStyleMask: UInt32) -> Any!
items.desc: Creates a shared instance of the IKFilterBrowserPanel class.

items.name: static let IKFilterBrowserWillPreviewFilter: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: Posted before showing a filter preview, allowing an application to set the parameters of a filter.

items.name: static let IKFilterBrowserFilterSelected: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: Posted when the user clicks a filter name in the filter browser.

items.name: static let IKFilterBrowserFilterDoubleClick: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: Posted when the user double-clicks a filter in the filter browser.
